answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.Her symptoms could also be due to juvenile diabetes. Check with your doctor to rule out this condition.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: Hi my daughter is 2 yrs old. We had labs done a month ago because she wants food all the time like she doesnt get full. Her AST and ALP levels were high. So we came back a month later to do labs again. Well those levels are still high and the immunoglobin a&g were borderline low, as well as globulin. We will be seeing a specialist but i am stumped. It all points to the liver but wondering if its something that is slowly appearing. Any help or advice would be appreciated thanks/
title: Possible liver issue?
